name: The 3DO Interactive Sampler CD #1
overview:
Cd that has previews of games for the 3DO

All games are non playable. They are previews.

Previews are as follows:

Dragons Lair
Stellar 7- Draxans Revenge
Gridders
The Horder
Orion- Off Road
Pebble Beach Golf Links
Sewer Shark
Total Eclipse
Way Of The Warrior
